page.title: 13CRUDWELL VILLAGE FETE
page.content: Each summer the village holds this {major fund raising event}in the school playing field.In 1985 about Â£800 was raised which was{divided equally {between the Church,the Village Hall {and the Playing Field.}1985 was one of the wettest fete days in recent years but people still enjoyed themselves and spent their money.One of the main features was the{fun run.}The course was about 2\ miles long and various prizes were awarded.{Children's {competitions}were well supported and the entries were displayed in the school.{The church was beautifully {decorated}with flowers for the fete weekend.There were many helpers who ran the popular activities which include tombola,candy floss,afternoon teas,lucky dip,fortune telling and inflatable cushions for bouncing on.
